Posted By: Gelzo (7/4/2011 2:08:24 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
The wonderful thing about slivers   
is slivers are wonderful things   
their bodies are made out of sinew   
they've got muscles on top of their wings   
they're hasted, trample, shroud, and shadow   
plus one   
plus one   
plus one   
but the most wonderful thing about slivers is   
there...   
is more than one!   
  
Please, anyone who ever reads this, could you help, copy this text and then paste it on every Sliver card discussion. THANK YOU! :)
